techmeme.title: As power needs of AI push emissions up, tech companies explore experimental clean energy projects such as atomic fusion and futuristic geothermal power plants (Washington Post)
Research: the number of freelance jobs on platforms like Upwork, in areas where generative AI excels, have dropped by as much as 21% since ChatGPT's debut (Christopher Mims/Wall Street Journal)
A look at Singapore's vital role in the global semiconductor industry: the city-state accounts for ~10% of chip output and 20% of chip-equipment production (Reuters)
Data provider Syntun: total GMV during China's 618 online shopping event fell 7% YoY to $102B, in first-ever drop; Alibaba, JD, and PDD didn't release GMV data (Financial Times)
Huawei announces HarmonyOS Next, to be used in all of its devices, Harmony Intelligence, to integrate AI onto its devices, and Pangu 5.0, a family of four LLMs (Nikkei Asia)
